name: Greyhaven Town Encounters
description: Random encounters for the town of Greyhaven

results.text: Militia patrol passes by, keeping watch.
Roderick Smithson tells a story, some true, some false.
Children run through Market Green, nearly colliding with adventurers.
Bramblefoot/Stoutheart rivalry erupts into minor squabble.
Tavern Keeper Mara offers a side quest or rumor.
Merchant caravan arrives with exotic goods.
Small street fight breaks out; militia intervenes.
Minor magical mishap discovered (warning, not severe).
Pickpocket attempts theft.
A lost traveler asks for directions.
Animal escape: horse or goat runs through streets.
Harper agent observes a suspicious Zhentarim courier.
Orc raiding party spotted approaching town outskirts.
Town festival or market celebration event.
Minor quarrel between townsfolk escalates.
Tanner Ivor requests help with a shipment.
Blacksmith Torin asks for rare ore or materials.
A wandering adventurer seeks work or rumors.
A sudden storm or environmental hazard occurs.
Stray dog or cat causes a minor distraction.
